title: Improve documentation for ToolTask-derived classes
body:
For example, [`Exec`'s documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/exec-task?view=vs-2017) doesn't directly mention its `StandardOutputImportance` parameter. Instead it has this paragraph

> In addition to the parameters listed in this document, this task inherits parameters from the ToolTaskExtension class, which itself inherits from the ToolTask class. For a list of these additional parameters and their descriptions, see [ToolTaskExtension base class](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/tooltaskextension-base-class).

That page does mention and link to [API documentation on `StandardOutputImportance`](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/microsoft.build.utilities.tooltask.standardoutputimportance?view=netframework-4.7.2), but that documentation a) is outdated and b) doesn't mention the valid set of input strings (in this case "string representations of the `Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance` enumeration).

This could be dramatically improved.
